LandingPage.meta.description: Everything you need to know about building a marketplace with Sharetribe Flex.
LandingPage.introParagraph1: Sharetribe Flex is the fastest and most affordable way to set up a powerful marketplace platform that is uniquely yours.
LandingPage.introParagraph2: To see what features we are building or planning to build, see the
LandingPage.introduction.title: Introduction to Flex
LandingPage.introduction.description: Learn if Sharetribe Flex is the right choice for you, what development skills are needed, and how you can get the most out of Flex’s APIs and templates.
LandingPage.tutorial.title: Tutorial
LandingPage.tutorial.description: A step-by-step tutorial to help you build a fully functional marketplace and learn about all the key features of Flex.
LandingPage.concepts.title: Concepts
LandingPage.concepts.description: Explanations for important concepts and background information about the design decisions behind Flex.
LandingPage.designToolkit.title: Flex Design Toolkit
LandingPage.designToolkit.description: Understand the best practises of designing for Flex. Take the design toolkit for Flex into use to find an easy way to communicate your ideas forward.
LandingPage.bestPicks.heading: Looking for these?
LandingPage.bestPicks.description: Popular articles and guides to making the most common customizations.

ArticleIndexPage.introduction.title: Introduction to Flex
ArticleIndexPage.introduction.descriptio: Sharetribe Flex is a complete solution for building powerful online marketplaces. Flex offers all the necessary marketplace infrastructure out of the box while allowing you full control to customize your user experience. As your business grows, Flex takes care of running and scaling your backend. Powered by modern technology (React, Redux, and Node.js) and designed around a headless architecture, Flex is fast, scalable and customizable. These articles cover the basics of Sharetribe Flex and introduce some core concepts that will help you to start building your custom marketplace solution.
ArticleIndexPage.tutorial.title: Tutorial
ArticleIndexPage.tutorial.description: We provide a series of step-by-step tutorials that cover the key features needed to begin customizing your Flex marketplace. You will learn to make changes to branding, extend the data model, and customize the transaction process. These tutorials are designed for those who learn by doing.
ArticleIndexPage.concepts.title: All Concepts articles
ArticleIndexPage.concepts.description: Explanations and background information for important concepts and design decisions behind the platform.
ArticleIndexPage.how-to.title: All how-to articles
ArticleIndexPage.how-to.description: A collection of articles that help you to create custom features on top of the Flex APIs.
ArticleIndexPage.design-toolkit.title: Design Toolkit
ArticleIndexPage.design-toolkit.descript: The Design Toolkit provides you with the tools to plan and design your custom marketplace. All Sharetribe Web Template designs and wireframes are included as Sketch files in both mobile and web layouts. The Toolkit also includes a comprehensive guide to understanding your users’ needs through user journeys. These resources provide an excellent starting point for building your unique marketplace on top of Sharetribe Flex.
ArticleIndexPage.ftw.title: Sharetribe Web Template articles
ArticleIndexPage.ftw.description: Articles that help you to understand how the Sharetribe Web Template works.
ArticleIndexPage.integrations.title: Integrations
ArticleIndexPage.integrations.descriptio: Sharetribe Flex provides support for custom integrations through the Integration API, which provides full access to your marketplace’s data. You can use the Integration API to grant access for 3rd-party integrations that need to access your marketplace data, or for applications that run in your own backend systems. This selection of articles provides some detailed examples on how integrations can be used to customize your marketplace.
ArticleIndexPage.flex-cli.title: Flex CLI
ArticleIndexPage.flex-cli.description: Flex CLI (Command-line interface) is a tool for changing your marketplace's advanced configurations such as transaction processes and email templates. Flex CLI should not be mistaken for Flex Console. Flex CLI provides the tools for more technical configurations and process customization, whereas Flex Console provides an interface to manage marketplace assets and basic marketplace configuration. This selection of articles provides an overview of the features of Flex CLI and how it can be used to make advanced configurations to your marketplace.
ArticleIndexPage.references.title: All Reference articles
ArticleIndexPage.references.description: This collection of articles provides a technical description on the various components that form Sharetribe Flex, such as handling transaction processes, using extended data and availability and stock management. Here you can also find information on our API endpoints and the JavaScript SDKs that can be used to access them.
ArticleIndexPage.operator-guides.title: All Operator Guides
